name: Time, Line
description:
"Change the past will change the future." But what if the future and past are presented in one scene?

Time, Line is a single-player puzzle game. A line divides time into two parts. The past is on the left side and the future is on the right. Player can control the line to change the ratio of time in the scene. Utilize unique time features to solve puzzles!

How to play

Move player: WASD or ←↑→↓

Move line: J/K or X/C

Undo: Z  

Reset: R
